activities: storage of data contained in Ascend software; access to data for purposes of providing support to our licensees (independent bicycle retailers authorized to sell bicycles manufacture or distributed by Trek Bicycle Corporation).
eucountries: Austria, Denmark, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Information Services - (INF)Computer Software - (CSF)Sporting Goods & Recreational Equipment - (SPT)
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program; data subjects should first try to resolve any dispute with the relevant data controller (the licensee/retailer) and, failing that, by contacting Trek Retail Corp directly.
